a.title: Permalink to The Arabic Honor Society winner, Somia Algazali

h2.a: The Arabic Honor Society winner, Somia Algazali

div.div: Somia Algazali, a high school student at Frontier International Academy has been awarded second place prize from The Arabic Honor Society short story contest. Her story exemplified exceptional creativity, mechanics, and overall use of Arabic to describe her favorite fall activity.
